title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Skills: Transforming Teacher Practices for Eco-Social Change: An Arts-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants improve their ability to design math activities reflecting the interconnectedness of ecosystems and humans by 80% or more
Create three or more lesson materials connecting math concepts to environmental issues using art-based methodologies
Develop two or more assessment tools that stimulate students' imagination through digital collage creation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
